name: The Shadow of YANA
description:
The Shadow Of YANA

Story :

YANA discover that he his not alone. His shadow is possessed by an ancient spirit, and now, he is chasing him !

Run to save your life !

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

The theme was : You Are Not Alone

Thank you for giving it a try :)

Controls :

Move : Arrow key / WSAD

Jump : Space
